> Is there a way in JUnit to mark certain parts of code as not 
> recommended: e.g.
> 
> [...]
> 
> In this snippet: the ArrayList object is created but never 
> returned, and reqFieldTypes reference does not "know" about 
> the "NEW" reqFieldTypes.

A static code analysis tool like PMD might be better suited to that
purpose:

http://pmd.sf.net/

Disclaimer: I'm one of the PMD developers.
